author: Morgan Sung
title: Actually, wear whatever you want while working from home
description: I don't know who needs to hear this, but here we go: We're living through a pandemic. Wear whatever the fuck you want while working from home. Our corporate hell work culture has "expectations" and "recommendations" for maintaining a sense of professionalism.…
content:
I don't know who needs to hear this, but here we go: We're living through a pandemic. Wear whatever the fuck you want while working from home. 
Our corporate hell work culture has "expectations" and "recommendations" for maintaining a sense of professionalis… [+4101 chars]
